attributes.action: Observe the sale of Landrover/Jaguar and consider political and economic support to safeguard manufacturing in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is not about gas guzzling vehicles but about safegfuarding manufacturing.Both these names are marques within British motoring history and, whilst are increasing in their turnover and profitability also provide affiliated UK companies,their employees and families with livelihoods. Halewood in Merseyside is an efficient model of manufacturing and is helping to bring prosperity to the region. We ask the government to help safeguard both the jobs and livelihoods of those employed by the organisation and ensure that a great British motoring name (i.e. Landrover) remains manufactured in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
